name: copilotprompts-code-review-csharp
title: C# Code Review Skill for GitHub Copilot
shortDescription: A GitHub Copilot custom skill that performs structured code reviews of C# source code, checking naming conventions, performance, security, and .NET best practices.
longDescription: A reusable GitHub Copilot skill that teaches Copilot to perform comprehensive C# code reviews. The skill analyzes code for naming conventions, performance pitfalls, security vulnerabilities, and .NET best practices, then produces a prioritized Markdown report with actionable suggestions. Install it by copying the SKILL.md file into your repository's .github/skills/ folder.

thumbnails.alt: Screenshot of GitHub Copilot performing a C# code review using the skill
